attributes.review: when i opened the app i immediately stared to vomit. there was a picture of donald trump naked. my eyes were about to explode but lucky me..they didn’t. anyway, when my dog saw the photo..he died. he just flopped over and died. i can’t believe it. trump killed my dog. and now i have about 56 heart attacks a day and vomit 83 times an hour. it’s awful. thanks trump.
attributes.title: trump killed my dog🌚
